name: Ultima: The False Prophet
overview: In this, the first Super NES game in the Ultima series, the Underworld has been destroyed during the rescue of Lord British, and fierce gargoyles have been released! Search for hidden runes while defending shrines from gargoyle attacks. Discover their secret with the magic of the moonstones. Become the key to the salvation of Britannia! If you've ever played an Ultima game, you'll want to continue with the ultimate test of skill, Ultima: The False Prophet. And if you've never played an Ultima game, it's time to take the challenge!
